wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Lynn Dawson is an English actress and filmmaker.

link_mentions.page: List of Americans of English descent

response: When Morgan and Cove finally locate von Zimmermann, he is badly injured and suffering from amnesia. With the daunting task of getting back to Cairo ahead of them, the trio are pitted against each other in an elaborate and deadly game of deception and survival. The arrival of a German pilot in a Fokker Dr.1 triplane fighter leads to a climatic conclusion to their epic struggles. British actress, Sarah Lynn Dawson, also appears in the film as British Nurse Patricia Evans. The twist ending, hints at the possibility of a sequel.'
* Sarah Lynn Dawson as Patricia Evans
* Sarah Lynn Dawson (born 1981), English actress and screenwriter
